entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 29.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
